thread.section_title: Palazzo Navona Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastico!
thread.title_full: Fantastico! - Review of Palazzo Navona Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: KerryC23
title: Fantastico!
text:
Just returned from a trip to Rome with my husband.
Stayed for 3 nights at Palazzo Navona Hotel - it was fantastico!
The staff could not have done any more to help - from a friendly welcome, help with directions, great drinks, clean facilities, good breakfast, could not fault them, thank you!
The hotel is also very well placed for getting around the city.
Highly recommend & hope to return!
